body: Solaris is kind of a special snowflake.  I don't much care which way you go.  Other systems are going to have direct ioctls in the x/sys/unix package, though, so if they are going to look the same on Solaris as on other systems there would be a minor advantage to using the ioctls on both.  If they are going to look different then it doesn't much matter what Solaris does.
